Human Resource Associate Job at Assets Microfinance Bank




        
    

        
        At Assets MFB, we offer value-based banking to Nigerians by creating superior value for all our stakeholders with the most effective and sustainable technologies, holding ourselves to the highest professional and ethical standards, and building an enduring transparent institution.

Assets Microfinance bank is a tier-1 deposit mobilization bank providing accessible, reliable and convenient financial services to individuals and businesses across Nigeria

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Associate

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos 

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Spearhead the recruitment and onboarding process, including sourcing, screening, conducting interviews, the selection process, and onboarding of new hires.
	Maintain up-to-date employee records (physical and electronic) in compliance with statutory requirements and internal policies.
	Support the preparation, issuance, and tracking of HR documentation (e.g., confirmation letters, promotion letters, and memos).
	Maintain and update employee records using Human Resource Information Systems (HRIS) for efficient record-keeping and management.
	8Collect, analyze, and present HR data such as turnover rates, training hours, and engagement scores.
	Oversee attendance, payroll processing, and leave management, ensuring accurate documentation and compliance.
	Handle employee relations, grievances, and conflict resolution to maintain a positive and productive work environment.
	Assist in planning and executing staff engagement activities, celebrations, and recognition programs.
	Gather feedback from staff and support initiatives that drive employee satisfaction and retention.
	Coordinate internal and external training programs, including scheduling, attendance tracking, and post-training evaluations.
	Ensure compliance with labour laws, HR policies, and regulatory requirements, keeping up with HR best practices.
	Prepare periodic HR reports for management decision-making.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Industrial Relations, or a related field.
	3 - 5 years of relevant HR experience, preferably in the banking/fintech and HR consulting sector.
	Gender: Preferably a female
	Proficiency in HRIS platforms is an added advantage.
	Strong knowledge of HR best practices and Nigerian labour laws.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills.


Remuneration
N250,000 - N350,000 net monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@assetsmfb.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Job Openings at Yaliam Press Limited
content:
Yaliam Press Limited is a foremost reputable security and commercial printing outfit carrying out wide range of services including industrial publishing, digital/label printing, packaging, security & general printing with full complement of latest equipment in offset and digital printing.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Client Service / Marketing Officer

Job Location: Abuja
Employment type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Minimum of Degree or HND in Marketing or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in marketing and customer service within the printing industry or related field.
	Age: 30 to 40 years
	Proven track record of developing effective marketing strategies, problem-solving, and communication skills.
	Previous marketing experience in a printing firm or related firm will be of added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Applications with updated Curriculum Vitae with current address and phone number(s) and email, 2 recent passport photographs and photocopies of credentials to:
The Chairman / CEO,
Yaliam Press Limited,
No. 3, Abeokuta Street,
Area 8, Garki,
Abuja.
OR

Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Applications with updated Curriculum Vitae with current address and phone number(s) and email, 2 recent passport photographs and photocopies of credentials to:

Abuja.
Or

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be invited for an interview.

 

 

3.) Deputy Chief Accountant

Job Location: Abuja
Employment type: Full-time

Requirements


	Minimum of BSC or HND in Accounting or its equivalent.

title: Job Openings at Alpha Mead Group
content:
Alpha Mead Group (AMG) is a Total Real Estate Solutions Company established to provide robust business support services to local and international Real Estate investors or owners with interests in Facilities Management, Real Estate Development and Advisory, Security Systems and Technologies, Training, Healthcare Management and Real Estate Financing Services.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) HVAC Technician

Job Locations: Lagos & Kano
Employment Type: Full-time
Slot: 2 Opening

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Install and maintain HVAC systems, including air conditioning, heating, and ventilation systems.
	Diagnose and troubleshoot issues in HVAC systems.
	Perform routine maintenance to ensure system efficiency and longevity.
	Monitor and maintain refrigerant levels and other system components.
	Adhere to all safety protocols and building codes.
	Keep detailed records of maintenance and repairs.


Key Qualifications


	Minimum Qualification: SSCE / OND / HND
	Trade Test I, II & III certifications are required
	Relevant technical certifications in HVAC systems (e.g., NATE certification).
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in HVAC installation and maintenance.
	Strong knowledge of electrical and mechanical components in HVAC systems.
	Ability to work independently and solve complex technical problems.


Application Closing Date: 10th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application Letter and CV to: recruitment@alphamead.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Generator Technician

Job Location: Albasa, Kano
Employment Type: Full-time
Slot: 2 Opening

Responsibilities


	Monitor gauges and meters to ensure that the generator is operating efficiently
